languages.text: {n}Арбитр хранит долгую паузу, а затем решительно рубит:{/n} "Я свалял дурака той ночью. Между нами возникла близость, и это... возможно, это меня встревожило. Или я не был готов испытать сильное чувство. Но я его испытал — я думаю о вас и о том, что могло бы между нами быть".

traits.locale_text: Я много думаю о вас после совместной ночи. Возможно я... поспешил

languages.text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр хранит долгую паузу, а затем решительно рубит:{/n} "Я свалял дурака той ночью. Между нами возникла близость, и это... возможно, это меня встревожило. Или я не был готов испытать сильное чувство. Но я его испытал — я думаю о вас и о том, что могло бы между нами быть".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは長い間何も言わなかったが、やがてためらうことなく語り始めた。{/n}「あの夜、私はみっともないことをしてしまいました。あの時、私たちは親密でした。おそらくそれで…不安になったのかもしれません。あるいは、そこまで強く想う覚悟ができていなかったのでしょう。ですが、確かに感じたのです…あなたのことや、そして私たちの間に生まれるかもしれないものについて考えています」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは長い間何も言わなかったが、やがてためらうことなく語り始めた。{/n}「あの夜、私はみっともないことをしてしまいました。あの時、私たちは親密でした。おそらくそれで…不安になったのかもしれません。あるいは、そこまで強く想う覚悟ができていなかったのでしょう。ですが、確かに感じたのです…あなたのことや、そして私たちの間に生まれるかもしれないものについて考えています」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bleibt eine ganze Weile stumm, spricht dann aber ohne Scheu:{/n} "Ich habe an jenem Abend einen Narren aus mir gemacht. Zwischen uns war diese Intimität, und sie ... hat mir möglicherweise Angst gemacht. Oder vielleicht war ich auch auf so starke Gefühle nicht vorbereitet. Aber ich habe sie gespürt – ich denke an Euch und daran, was zwischen uns sein könnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

Zwischen uns war diese Intimität, und sie ... hat mir möglicherweise Angst gemacht. Oder vielleicht war ich auch auf so starke Gefühle nicht vorbereitet. Aber ich habe sie gespürt – ich denke an Euch und daran, was zwischen uns sein könnte."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne garde le silence un long moment, puis il prend la parole et s'exprime sans réserve :{/n} « Je me suis ridiculisé, cette nuit-là. Il y avait entre nous une intimité certaine, et... j'ai pris peur. Ou alors, je n'étais pas préparé à ressentir quelque chose d'aussi fort. Mais mes sentiments étaient bien réels... et depuis, je n'arrête pas de penser à vous et à ce qui pourrait se passer entre nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne garde le silence un long moment, puis il prend la parole et s'exprime sans réserve :{/n} « Je me suis ridiculisé, cette nuit-là. Il y avait entre nous une intimité certaine, et... j'ai pris peur. Ou alors, je n'étais pas préparé à ressentir quelque chose d'aussi fort. Mais mes sentiments étaient bien réels... et depuis, je n'arrête pas de penser à vous et à ce qui pourrait se passer entre nous. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne guarda silencio durante un rato, pero luego habla sin tapujos:{/n} «Esa noche me comporté como un imbécil. Compartíamos una intimidad, y yo... quizá me agobié. O tal vez no estaba preparado para sentir algo con tanta intensidad. Pero el caso es que lo sentía de verdad; pienso en usted, y en lo que podría haber entre nosotros».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙沉默了很长时间，之后开了口，对你没有任何保留。{/n}“那天晚上我出了洋相。我们享受了亲密的时光，而且……或许这让我感到焦虑不安，也或许我还没有准备好面对如此强烈的感情。但我确实感觉到了那一切，我想到了你，想到了我们之间可能的未来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne uzun süre sessiz kalıp sonra çekincesizce konuşuyor.{/n} "O gece kendimi maskara ettim. Aramızdaki garip yakınlaşma beni biraz ürküttü. Belki de bu kadar yoğun hislere hazır olmadığımdandır. Fakat hissiyatımı inkâr edemem, bu yüzden aramızda doğabilecek şeyleri düşünmeden edemedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne says nothing for a long time, but then begins speaking without reserve:{/n} "I made a fool of myself that night. There was an intimacy between us, and it... perhaps it made me anxious. Or perhaps I wasn't prepared to feel so strongly. But I did feel it — I think about you and about what there could be between us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne uzun süre sessiz kalır, sonra çekincesiz konuşur.{/n} "O gece kendimi maskara ettim. Aramızda garip bir yakınlık hasıl oldu, beni biraz ürküttü. Belki de bu kadar yoğun hislere hazır olmadığım içindir. Fakat hissiyatımı inkâr edemem, bu yüzden aramızda doğabilecek şeyleri düşünmeden edemedim."
